mapper.select: select a.roomcode, a.name roomname, b.name typename, a.howmany, a.howmuch, b.typecode from room a, roomtype b where a.type=b.typecode order by roomname
select typecode, name from roomtype order by typecode
mapper.update: update room set name=#{param2}, type=#{param3}, howmany=#{param4}, howmuch=#{param5} where roomcode=#{param1}
